entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries or rain showers. High plus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning then 30 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and early afternoon. Periods of rain beginning in the afternoon. Wind becoming north 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Friday 28 April 2023
